description: Test cases for selecting a venue for the session

test_cases.name: Display Venue Suggestions
test_cases.expected_result: Screen displays recommended venues with header 'Choose a venue' and 'Recommended for X players'

test_cases.name: Venue Card Information Display
preconditions: User is on Venue Suggestions screen
test_cases.expected_result: Each venue card shows: icon, name, type (indoor/outdoor), distance, price per person, rating

test_cases.name: Select Primary Venue
preconditions: User is on Venue Suggestions screen
steps: Click 'Select' button on BlueCourt Sports Center
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Booking time selection screen for selected venue

test_cases.name: Select Alternative Venue
preconditions: User is on Venue Suggestions screen
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Booking time selection screen for selected venue

test_cases.name: Venue Distance Display
preconditions: User is on Venue Suggestions screen
test_cases.expected_result: Distances displayed accurately (e.g., '0.8 km away', '1.2 km')

test_cases.name: Venue Pricing Display
preconditions: User is on Venue Suggestions screen
test_cases.expected_result: Per-person pricing displayed (e.g., '$8 / hr per person', '$6 / hr per person')

test_cases.name: Venue Rating Display
preconditions: User is on Venue Suggestions screen

test_cases.name: Quick Suggest and Book
preconditions: User is on Venue Suggestions screen
test_cases.expected_result: Venue suggested and user navigated to booking confirmation

test_cases.name: Navigate Back to Session Detail
preconditions: User is on Venue Suggestions screen
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated back to Session Detail screen

test_cases.name: No Venues Available
preconditions: User is on Venue Suggestions screen
test_cases.expected_result: Empty state message displayed indicating no venues available
